meanings.definition: A stew or thick soup typically made with a variety of ingredients including meat, vegetables, and spices.
meanings.sent1: Mom cooked a delicious gumbo for dinner last night.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant's specialty is seafood gumbo.
meanings.sent3: The gumbo was so hot, it made my nose run!
meanings.sent4: Her gumbo of emotions simmered quietly within her.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the simmering gumbo filled the kitchen with warmth.

meanings.definition: A type of thick, dark roux used in Cajun and Creole cooking.
meanings.sent1: The chef added the gumbo to the pot to thicken the sauce.
meanings.sent2: The secret to the perfect gumbo is in the roux.
meanings.sent3: The gumbo roux looked like melted chocolate in the pan.
meanings.sent4: His words acted as a gumbo, binding the team together.
meanings.sent5: The gumbo of flavors in the roux created a rich base for the dish.

meanings.definition: A type of okra plant commonly used in Southern cooking.
meanings.sent1: Grandma planted gumbo in her backyard garden.
meanings.sent2: The gumbo plant thrived in the warm Southern climate.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel nibbled on the gumbo leaves.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas grew like a gumbo, branching out in all directions.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green of the gumbo plant brightened up the garden.
